name: africa_child_mortality
title: Child Mortality in Africa
description: Under-5 mortality (estimated deaths per 1,000 child-years) for the 1980s, 1990s, and 2000s. Based on geo-spatial interpolation methods using data from the Demographic and Health Survey across 28 Sub-Saharan countries.

extract_types_info.mean: average under-5 mortality for each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.max: maximum under-5 mortality per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum under-5 mortality per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Marshall Burke, Sam Heft-Neal, and Eran Bendavid. Understanding variation in child mortality across Sub-Saharan Africa: A spatial analysis. The Lancet Global Health, 2016, Volume 4, Issue 12, e936-e94.
